title: BRIEF-Dollarama Q2 Earnings Per Share C$0.45

BRIEF-Dollarama Q2 Earnings Per Share C$0.45

Stock Markets 24 minutes ago (Sep 12, 2019 07:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Dollarama Q2 Earnings Per Share C$0.45 Sept 12 (Reuters) - Dollarama Inc : * DOLLARAMA REPORTS FISCAL 2020 SECOND QUARTER RESULTS * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.45 * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE C$0.46 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * Q2 SALES C$946.4 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF C$939.2 MILLION * QTRLY COMPARABLE STORE SALES GREW 4.7%, OVER AND ABOVE A 2.6% GROWTH PREVIOUS YEAR * SEES FISCAL 2020 COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH IN RANGE OF 3.5% TO 4.5% * NARROWING FY GROSS MARGIN AS A PERCENTAGE OF SALES ANNUAL GUIDANCE TO RANGE OF 43.25% TO 43.75% UNDER IFRS 16
